In England, in the seven days to 21 July, there were 281,087 new confirmed cases (499.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 14 July, there were 240,478 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 17% (40,609 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 26 July is 4,993,657 (8,871.8 cases per 100,000 population).
